page.title: 08A HOME IN NEWBIGGIN HALL.
page.content: My name is{Danielle.}I am 9 years old and I go to Farne First School. There are{5 people in my family including myself.We live in a brick built{semi-detatched house}in Maudlin Place.It has 3 bedrooms and 3 rooms downstairs.My big sister sleeps in the small room and{I share a bedroom with my little sister.My mam gets very annoyed when our rooms are untidy.My dad is very funny and he plays jokes on us.He has made our{loft into a {playroom}so we have all of our toys up there.We also have a{garage}but we dont keep our Ford Escort car in it.It is used for our bikes,my sisters play pram and my dads scrap pieces for his car.We have a video,three radio- cassettes,two record players and a computer.Our street is quiet and we have nice neighbours.We use 3 shops which are just around the corner.
